about_text:
The “diAnoia” app was created by The not-for-profit company SciFY in the framework of the “Σημεία Στήριξης” program that is co-funded by the TIMA Foundation, the Latsis Foundation, the Hellenic Hope charity trust and the Bossodaki Foundation. The iOS version was realised thanks to the support and cooperation of Alzheimer Athens.

More info can be found here.
help_text:
Print Cognitive Exercises Select the desired activity and click “Share and Print”. Then select a sharing/and or printing app to view the exercise in printable format.
A common practice is to send the activity to your email. By opening the email from your computer or phone, you can then print it.

Keep the exercise history Keep track of how often your loved ones exercise!
You kan keep a calendar with useful statistics. Don't forget, the quality of exercise and the quality of your relationship matters.

Select the exercise that was performed and click on "Done today". Automatically, the exercise is saved in history. You can access your history in "My History".
